snippet: A letter signed by 16 Pakistan scholars and sent to Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton expressing concern for Husain Haqqani, the former Pakistani ambassador to the United States.
lead_paragraph: A letter signed by 16 Pakistan scholars and sent to Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton expressing concern for Husain Haqqani, the former Pakistani ambassador to the United States.

headline.main: Letter to Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton
